title: Early 90s subtitling font
content:
This font was used in old (90s, I think) amateur subtitling of animated series. At least for me, it has a nice VHS-era look, but I cannot identify it, since it looks... too normal. I still like it though. This font and Camcorder are the perfect duo for VHS style.

Any suggestions? ;)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819234659/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_16.png) | 312.37 KB |
author: Ultimate Hammer Bro

comments.content: Btw, sorry for the crappy quality. It's the best I could find.

In fact, I've found some better examples on YT. The quality is not great, but these are 480p, and not 240p as the previous ones were.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819234659im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font%202_4434.png)
  
Is anyone able to identify it with this new image?  
Thanks
